articles.author: Josh Pick
articles.title: Reactions to Florida State’s comeback win over Louisville - Tomahawk Nation
articles.description: Mike Norvell’s Florida State Seminoles overcame an injury to starting quarterback Jordan Travis to come-from-behind and beat the Louisville Cardinals on ESPN Friday night. We take a look at some of the best social media reactions.
articles.content: On a night when Mike Norvells Florida State Seminoles football team had every reason to give in, the Noles continued to battle, finding a way to outlast Scott Satterfields Louisville Cardinals 35-31 … [+1915 chars]
